mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (id, event_id, discount_type, discount_rate, discount_price, coupon_type, max_quantity, issued_quantity, validate_start_date, validate_end_date, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{eventId}, #{discountType}, #{discountRate}, #{discountPrice},#{couponType},#{maxQuantity}, #{issuedQuantity}, #{validateStartDate}, #{validateEndDate}, #{createdAt},#{updatedAt} );
mapper.select: SELECT id, event_id, discount_type, discount_rate, discount_price, coupon_type, max_quantity, issued_quantity, validate_start_date, validate_end_date, created_at, updated_at FROM coupon WHERE id = #{id};
